sections.heading: Villages; contract; cost; negotiated
sections.text: The cost to any village under a contract entered into pursuant to sections 19-3801 to 19-3804 shall be negotiated and included as a part of the formal contract entered into and agreed to by both parties.SourceLaws 1971, LB 594, ยง 3;Laws 1977, LB 57, ยง 1.
